|flags = metal case, heatsink, |accessible_UART = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |price = |reldate = |newegg = N82E16833127332 |upc = |ean = |asin = B0036DRHHC |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 98DX3025 *Flash/RAM: 16MB SPI Flash, 64MB RAM *20x GbE ports *4x GbE ports and 4x shared SFP slots *Rack mountable ==Links of Interest== [https://dlink-gpl.s3.amazonaws.com/GPL1200119/DGS-1210-24-FOSSCode.rar GPL Firmware] ==Pictures==

A1		10P, 16, 24, 48			Marvell
B1		10P, 20, 28(P), 52		Marvell
